ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 756
ygData.msgSnippet: ... *sigh* I play an enchanter too. Before they start giving bard the ability to make enchanted items, why don t they implement what they promised to do for
ygData.messageBody:
>Imagine that an Incandecent Gloves (I use enchanter because they
>are so involved
>with everyone elses quest items- and I play one ) needed to have a
>bard sing a
>tune to change the Shadow Gloves to "Resonant Gloves". They
>shouldn't have just
>had one class be involved in many of these quests. In trade
>skills, image that
>a bard was necessary to create even better armor/weapons- the bard
>can sing his
>song to make sure that the metal used is "pure", or that the seams are "in
>harmony" (giving them additional strenght).

*sigh* I play an enchanter too. Before they start giving bard the ability
to make enchanted items, why don't they implement what they promised to do
for enchanters in doing the same first?

We even have Viscuous Mana, etc now that seems to imply they would be
working on more. And... nothing.

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara, level 14 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain, level 19 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 8 HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Phoenix, Solusek Ro
(Blackburrow)
